rules.description: Mac OSX: Use Function Keys in Supported Apps, else use Media Keys

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Slack" to keystroke "1" using control down'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Slack" to keystroke "2" using control down'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Slack" to keystroke "3" using control down'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Slack" to keystroke "4" using control down'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Slack" to keystroke "5" using control down'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Slack" to keystroke "6" using control down'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Slack" to keystroke "7" using control down'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Slack" to keystroke "8" using control down'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Slack" to keystroke "9" using control down'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Slack" to keystroke "0" using control down'

rules.description: Ctrl+1 to launch or focus VS Code
Ctrl+` to launch or focus Warp
Caps Lock to Escape on single press, Control on press and hold.
Command + Shift + v does special paste without formatting, equivalent to. cmd+opt+shift+v.
Remap Command+P to Command+K in Slack
Remap Command+P to Command+Shift+O in Xcode
